channel.title: How to declare player rights [Client Sided]

item.title: How to declare player rights [Client Sided]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

erm there should be a server side part of this most likely…that or check out how playerrights are read to the client. There has to be a way fro the server to tell the client to show this sprite at this accepted rank. If all else fails… ask deathchaos9 if he would assist you cause he has the only server where custom sprites are loaded in the minimap.

Read full topic
item.source: How to declare player rights [Client Sided]

item.title: How to declare player rights [Client Sided]
item.dc:creator: @Greivex Greivex
item.description:
@Greivex wrote:

so i am editing the sprites on my minimap. I edited the cache so there are new sprites in the cache so everything is there i just cant figure out how to make the client check a players rights to declare the sprite i want to load. any ideas?

			boolean flag2 = false;
			if(myPlayer.team != 0 && player.team != 0 && myPlayer.team == player.team)
				flag2 = true;
			if(flag1)
				markMinimap(mapDotFriend, j1, l3, false);
			else if(flag3)
				markMinimap(mapDotClan, j1, l3, false);
			else if(flag2)
				markMinimap(mapDotTeam, j1, l3, false);
			else if(playerRights == 1)
				markMinimap(mapDotMod, j1, l3, false);
			else if(playerRights == 2)
				markMinimap(mapDotAdmin, j1, l3, false);
			else if(playerRights == 3)
				markMinimap(mapDotOwner, j1, l3, false);
			else if(playerRights == 0)
				markMinimap(mapDotDonator, j1, l3, false);
			else
				markMinimap(mapDotPlayer, j1, l3, false);
		}

I know this is wrong this is just so you have a idea of what i am talking about

thanks for the help guys

Read full topic
item.source: How to declare player rights [Client Sided]
